title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions: Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc, the ultimate light-up frisbee for outdoor fun! With either 36 or 360 LEDs and 16 million color RGB options, this disc is 100x brighter than any other light-up flying disc. It features smart modes, motion sensors for automatic light-up, and is rechargeable in just 30 minutes for up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of match time. Whether for night play, freestyle tricks, or disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes, this 175g frisbee meets professional standards and is waterproof for durability. It's the perfect Christmas, birthday, or camping gift for men, boys, teens, and kids who love outdoor fun. Get your TOSY Flying Disc today and take your outdoor games to the next level!
